Plot: The day after the funeral of Varlam Aravidze, the mayor of a small Georgian town, his corpse turns up in his son's garden and is secretly reburied. But the corpse keeps returning, and the ...
Title: Repentance
Writer: Tengiz Abuladze, Nana Janelidze, Rezo Kveselava
Actors: Avtandil Makharadze, Ia Ninidze, Zeinab Botsvadze, Ketevan Abuladze
